title: Mortals All
description: Zach was just looking for a novel one-night-stand. Mary was looking for freedom. They found each other.Mortals All is a unique love story set against a future where economic and social changes have led to the creation of andrones, a caste of artificial persons assigned to Earth's more menial tasks. Mary is one such androne. Zach, meanwhile, is all too human. He's an expert on lust but a novice when it comes to love. Mary goes rogue, and with Zach's help, attempts to aid an underground group of drones. But standing in her way are the police, bounty hunters, a senatorial candidate haunted by a dark secret, and her own evolving humanity. On top of everything else, someone is trying to kill her. It's not long before she discovers Zach is right. Freedom isn't all it's cracked-up to be.
author: Bruce Golden
